items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight SCADA-like interface prototype that simulates industrial process monitoring. Features include animated flow visualization, temperature/pressure sensors, warning logic, and real-time status display using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
items.title: YaroslavKS/Mini_SCADA_presentation: A lightweight SCADA-like interface prototype that simulates industrial process monitoring. Features include animated flow visualization, temperature/pressure sensors, warning logic, and real-time status display using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

items.content_html: EasyTracker â€“ Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

items.content_html: A lightweight Lambda function that simulates log generation and sends them to CloudWatch Logs for observability testing. Designed to work with log-indexer-lambda for full log ingestion flow.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: ShadowDomKit is a lightweight JavaScript utility designed to solve the challenges of working with components inside Shadow DOM. It provides a simple, consistent API for finding elements and initializing JavaScript components across Shadow DOM boundaries.
items.title: ssanaullahrais/shadow-dom-kit: ShadowDomKit is a lightweight JavaScript utility designed to solve the challenges of working with components inside Shadow DOM. It provides a simple, consistent API for finding elements and initializing JavaScript components across Shadow DOM boundaries.

items.content_html: Gbedu Radar is a lightweight web application that delivers hyper-personalized web push notifications for upcoming song releases and music industry news from your favorite genres and artists. Built with React.js and Firebase, it integrates seamlessly with Spotify for dynamic music data, ensuring you never miss a beat.
items.title: Henryikenna/gbeduradar: Gbedu Radar is a lightweight web application that delivers hyper-personalized web push notifications for upcoming song releases and music industry news from your favorite genres and artists. Built with React.js and Firebase, it integrates seamlessly with Spotify for dynamic music data, ensuring you never miss a beat.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
